description: The AFCARS Trends Chart tracks children in Foster Care from FY 2002 through the most recent year. A table of data and a graphic depiction of trends are shown for children in care on the first day of the year, entries to foster care, exits, children waiting to be adopted, children adopted, children with terminations of parental rights, and total children served in foster care.

publisher.name: Administration for Children and Families, Department of Health & Human Services

title: Adoption and Foster Care Analysis and Reporting System Trends Chart and Table
